Jose.src.characters

Class Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • Jose.src.characters.Character
      • Jose.src.characters.Robot

  • public class Robot
extends Character
    The robot enemy, walks around and when the player is near, charges at him.
    Author:
    Dzejrou

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  Robot.STATE
      Enum denoting the Robot's state.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class Jose.src.characters.Character

        Character.DIRECTION

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private org.newdawn.slick.Animation anim_dead
      Animations of the Robot.
      private org.newdawn.slick.Animation anim_walk_left
      Animations of the Robot.
      private org.newdawn.slick.Animation anim_walk_right
      Animations of the Robot.
      private int charge_steps
      Keeps track of frame number in the charge for late direction change.
      private Robot.STATE curr_state
      Current state of the Robot.
      private int death_counter
      Counter used to check the time the Robot is lying dead on the floor.
      private int death_max
      Max amount of frames lying dead on the floor.
      private org.newdawn.slick.Image[] im_dead
      Image arrays used to create the animations.
      private org.newdawn.slick.Image[] im_walk_left
      Image arrays used to create the animations.
      private org.newdawn.slick.Image[] im_walk_right
      Image arrays used to create the animations.
      private int max_charge_distance
      Maximum amount of steps that the robot will charge for.
      private int max_steps
      Maximum amount of steps in one direction.
      private Player player
      Reference to the player object.
      private float speed
      Speed of the Robot (moves only vertically).
      private float sprite_diff
      Robot's walking right sprite is offset by this amount to the left, so the offset_x for hitboxes will need to alternate between 0 and 48 when the robot turns.
      private int step_count
      Amount of steps walked in the current direction.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void change_direction()
      Changes the walking direction of the robot.
      void die()
      Kills the robot:(
      private void draw_debug(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)
      Draws debug info - hitboxes.
      void draw(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)
      Draws the robot and the debug info if necessary.
      private float get_direction_modifier()
      Returns the sign modifier for movement in a certain direction.
      boolean is_dead()
      Returns true if the robot is dead and necessary time has passed for the body to be deleted.
      private org.newdawn.slick.geom.Rectangle main_hitbox()
      Returns the main hitbox which kills the player upon contact.
      private boolean player_near()
      Returns true if the player is close to the robot signaling that the robot should start charging.
      private void turn()
      Turns the robot if needed amount of steps has been walked by changing it's direction and applying the sprite offset, since the sprites differ when flipped by a vertical axis.
      private void update_alive(long delta)
      Special update method for when the robot is alive, updates the movement, collision detection, basic AI and takes in regard gravity.
      private void update_charging(long delta)
      Special update method to be used when the robot is chasing after the player.
      private void update_dead()
      Special update method for when the robot is dead, takes care of the death counter representing the body decay.
      private void update_gravity(long delta)
      Updates the robot wrt gravity.
      private void update_player_collisions()
      Checks for collisions between the robot and the player.
      void update(long delta)
      Updates the state and logic of the robot.
      private org.newdawn.slick.geom.Rectangle weak_hitbox()
      Returns the secondary hitbox that kills the robot upon contact with the player.

      • sprite_diff

        private final float sprite_diff
        Robot's walking right sprite is offset by this amount to the left, so the offset_x for hitboxes will need to alternate between 0 and 48 when the robot turns.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • death_counter

        private int death_counter
        Counter used to check the time the Robot is lying dead on the floor.

      • death_max

        private int death_max
        Max amount of frames lying dead on the floor.

      • charge_steps

        private int charge_steps
        Keeps track of frame number in the charge for late direction change.

      • max_charge_distance

        private int max_charge_distance
        Maximum amount of steps that the robot will charge for.

             View v,
             Player p)
        Constructor, set's all necessary attributes and calls Character's constructor.
        Parameters:
        m - Reference to the level's tile map.
        pos_x - X axis starting coordinate.
        pos_y - Y axis starting coordinate.
        v - Reference to the game's view.
        p - Reference to the player.

      • turn

        private void turn()
        Turns the robot if needed amount of steps has been walked by changing it's direction and applying the sprite offset, since the sprites differ when flipped by a vertical axis.
